name: Racing Cart
description:
Challenging racing game created for student reasearch group fair purposes.

Controll cart with WSAD, use SHIFT to  drift and CTRL to apply nitro.

Game may ask for network permissions - this happens because score is saved in locally stored database. We do not make use of any other private or public connections.

Enjoy!

Creators:
Patryk Lesiak & Maciej Pieniążek

Models:
Aleksandra Kuczek

Music:
Jakub Piasek
